result.reason: Multi-select and batch-edit of connections is a highly requested UX improvement for managing large connection inventories
result.approach: Enable TreeListView multi-select mode on the connection tree, implement a batch property editor that detects shared vs mixed values across selected connections, and apply bulk updates through existing ConnectionInfo property setters
